analysis.description:
msc.totalSupply (/unique_contracts/0x6bc8b04d3904967989b0f2bc91b32494f36f82c2.sol#170-172) shadows:
	- ERC20Basic.totalSupply (/unique_contracts/0x6bc8b04d3904967989b0f2bc91b32494f36f82c2.sol#68)

msc.getAccountLockState (/unique_contracts/0x6bc8b04d3904967989b0f2bc91b32494f36f82c2.sol#306-317) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (releaseLockAccount[_target] > 0) && (releaseLockAccount[_target] < block.timestamp) (/unique_contracts/0x6bc8b04d3904967989b0f2bc91b32494f36f82c2.sol#312-316)

msc.fallback (/unique_contracts/0x6bc8b04d3904967989b0f2bc91b32494f36f82c2.sol#364-376) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)((currentTime > crowdsaleStartTime) && (currentTime < crowdsaleEndTime)) (/unique_contracts/0x6bc8b04d3904967989b0f2bc91b32494f36f82c2.sol#369-372)
